TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pisirian, title = Pisirian, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pisirian} }

S.FORM: alang Pisirian ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Cinkong Song, kwara sali buwan nya ga 418 buwan, 1,054 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 70 kyan ku 733 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 30 kyan ku 321 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 64 , Puyuma 1 , binah lihuyan s'uli 5 . rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Pisirian hya' ga Mararo'ong. tay mkyahu' na Pisirian hya' ga Cirarokohay. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 1 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh
